//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "BLU Score Increment" );
if ( $get( FLOAT, "blueBlock")$, $=$, $0$ )
{
	set ( "blueBlock", $1$ );
	use ( "block_b" );
}
use ( "holo_b" );
use ( "score_b_inc" );
use ( "sound_score" );
wait ( 4000.000 );
if ( $get( FLOAT, "blueBlock")$, $=$, $1$ )
{
	set ( "blueBlock", $0$ );
	use ( "block_b" );
}
